text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg If today's sitting was an indication of how things are to proceed, then the number of MPs getting infected with covid19 will increase dramatically. Sitting in seat, ask a question then move to let someone else in - no cleansing. Also lots of MPs touching dispatch box while voting
